items.headline: Wholesale prices post biggest surge in three years, PPI shows, in sign of tariff-related inflation
items.summary_en: The cost of wholesale goods and services — where rising inflation tends to show up first — in July posted the biggest increase in three years, possibly heralding a sizable acceleration in price increases tied to higher U.S. tariffs.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.
